website_summaries.verdict: Not only are Nutri-Berries loaded with the nutrition-loaded nuts, seeds, and fruits a parakeet needs for a balanced diet, these crumbly pellets are too much fun for little birds to pull apart.
pros: Corn, white proso millet, and safflower seeds are the first 3 ingredients
Uses real pineapple, papaya, and mango chunks
cons: These ball-like pellets may seem large for the smallest of parakeets, but they are easy to crumble up

customer_reviews.title: A great treat.
customer_reviews.text: My sweet cockatiel loves these and looks forward to one every day. When I put one in her dish she always makes one happy chirp, as if to say thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda W.

customer_reviews.title: Great treats
customer_reviews.text: These are great, but my budgies are still not sure about them. They play with them rather than eat them for now.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette G.

customer_reviews.title: Good birdfood
customer_reviews.text: Lovebird seems to like this food most. He eats more of the seeds than he does with other options.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: They are loved by my parrots use has treats
customer_reviews.text: My ringneck parrot loves them I use has a treat
customer_reviews.author: Rene R.

customer_reviews.title: Birdie likes
customer_reviews.text: Birdie likes it, I buy it or she yells at me!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: My birds love these
customer_reviews.text: I have a white-winged parakeet and a lovebird and they both enjoy these balls.
customer_reviews.author: Sciencebird

customer_reviews.title: The double pack is a great value.
customer_reviews.text: My lovebird enjoys eating nutriberries...it is part of his food everyday. The double pack is a great value...thank-u.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Food!
customer_reviews.text: My love birds enjoy eating this food. I use it in addition to their staple seed and fruit and veggie diet and they always choose this first! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Lafeber's Gourmet Tropical Fruit Nutri-Berries...
customer_reviews.text: When the Bird picks these over Pizza, that says it all. Not to mention they don't go to waste. My bird loves the ingredients and loves the fact that she can hold the berry and pick off here favorite things off the berry first to eat. So very minimal goes to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Sun and Green Cheek Conure love all 4 verities of the Nutri-Berries
customer_reviews.text: My 2 Quakers, Sun and Green Cheek Conure love all 4 verities of the Nutri-Berries. I’m not sure if they love the taste or making a mess the best.LOL
customer_reviews.author: blueeagle1957

customer_reviews.title: A favorite food of our cockatiel
customer_reviews.text: My cockatiel loves these. They are expensive so I hope that they are as nutritional as they say. I order them quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: My cockatiel’s love it!
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered in 2 days and My two birds love it.
customer_reviews.author: richard kaeser

customer_reviews.title: My tiel says "Yum"
customer_reviews.text: Mt tiel loves this but I wish Amazon sold this product in a larger-quantity package. The bigger tubs sold by Amazon are different varieties and only the squirrels and mourning doves outside like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo R

product_meta.title: Lafeber's Gourmet Tropical Fruit Nutri-Berries Parakeet, Cockatiel & Conure Food 10 oz (2 Pack)
